medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea, vomiting, and epigastric abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began last night, with pain starting after eating chicken and rice for lunch and ice cream for dinner. Pain is midline, radiating bilaterally in a band-like fashion. The patient is unable to tolerate POs and has experienced chills overnight but no fevers, along with diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Rheumatoid Arthritis, Depression, Steroid-induced hypertension, Hyperhidrosis, Hyperalgias, chronic narcotic use, Anxiety, Borderline personality disorder.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of autoimmune disorders.
